title: Digital Puppet Masters Tournament Series - 1v1 (Friday Night) Schedule Change

embed.description: This organization will run tournaments for teams and players of all ranks and skill level, with a main focus on League Of Legends in the Oceanic Region.

body:
Hi, 

Just wanted to let players know there has been a schedule change for the 1v1 tournament due to other commitments.

It will be held on Friday night at 6pm AEST instead of thursday night. 

This tournament is a single elimination 1v1 event. It will be first to take to Nexus on the Howling Abyss Map.

All participants will receive a 4 win IP boost, and the winner will receive 1000rp courtesy of Riot.

I also provide a $10 Riot gift card to the winner.

Sorry for any inconvenience caused by the change. 

You can register anytime up until 15 minutes before the event through the Battlefy Client. 

https://battlefy.com/digital-puppet-masters

Look forward to seeing you there.
